resources.string: Do you want a joke Ammi?
Tap Me For A One Liner!
What are you doing?? Go back up! Nothing is down there

Hi! I am JokeMachine. I have been created specifically for Ammi. My only goal is to make Ammi smile as much as possible. Why? I do not know. Ask my creator that (you can send him an email through the menu on the top right).
What is it like being me? I literally cannot complain (programming will not allow me). But I am happy though, just look at my fuck*** icon.

So you want to submit a joke eh? First, make sure yo phone is connected to the internet (duh). Secondly, you CANNOT submit one liners, also, make sure the joke is split into two parts. Lastly, if I do not laugh at the joke, then I am deleting it.
